subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: After surviving a crash during a training run last year, Aksel Lund Svindal of Norway beat 65 of the best skiers in the world Friday at the only World Cup downhill race in the United States.
snippet: After surviving a crash during a training run last year, Aksel Lund Svindal of Norway beat 65 of the best skiers in the world Friday at the only World Cup downhill race in the United States.
